sentence.Network_en: A disembodied voice sounded from the back of the cabin.

sentence.Network_en: Byron himself is a disembodied idea, an aureate memory, compared with Aaron.
sentence.Network_cn: 跟埃伦相比,拜伦本人只是一个没有血肉的概念, 一个光辉灿烂的回忆而已.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 多年前。 One old story say that, on that day ,the disembodied(无实质的)spirits of all those who had died throughout the preceding (在先的)years.
《Friends》词汇表B ... rung n. 地位, 横档 disembodied adj. 无实质的, 无实体的 quivering 颤抖的.
once computers have become more or less disembodied , allof possibilities open up .当计算机变得或多或少没有实体，各种可能都出现了。

list.abs: As companies become disembodied into some Barlowian cyberspace , they take on the character of software ., 当各种公司取消实体进入某种巴洛式的赛博空间之后 , 它们就具有了某种类似于软件的特色.

1. 肥皂盒disembodied spirits 游魂martial disharmony 夫妻不和
powerful computers birthed the fantasy of a pure disembodied intelligence .功能强大的计算机催生了无躯体智能的狂热幻想。

entry.tran: 似脱离人而存在的;无实体的;脱离现实的
entry.def: Disembodied means seeming not to be attached to or to come from anyone.

example.ex: A disembodied voice sounded from the back of the cabin.
example.tran: 从柜子后面传来了一个不见其人的声音。

entry.tran: 脱离肉体的;与躯体分离的
entry.def: Disembodied means separated from or existing without a body.

example.tran: 一颗与躯体分离的头颅
